volcengine/verl

reinforcement learning library for training large language models, supports many RL algorithms, integrates with LLM tools, scales to models with up to 671B parameters

View on index

Related repos

  • Reinforcement learning framework for language agents
  • List of repositories for training LLM agents with reinforcement learning
  • large language model tutorials and training basics from scratch
  • Code and tutorials for building large language models from scratch in PyTorch
  • Reinforcement learning toolkit for text generation on MLX
  • Reinforcement learning tuning for reasoning LLM agents
  • RNN meets transformer for efficient large language models
  • run large language models on any device
